modName: Perkus Ranged Patch for PerMa and Extended UI
summary: Makes a small edit to PerMa whne used with Extended IO to allow Ranged Weapons perk tree to show missing data .
descriptionHtml:
When Perma (Perkus Maximus) is used with Extended UI there is a decent chance that the Ranged Weaponry Perk Tree will be missing the data "Requires" for each perk.  This tiny mod shortens the skill name as a workaround.  This allows the missing values to come back.

Before:

[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/800x600q90/661/lDyYlm.jpg[/img]

After:

][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/800x600q90/537/5e3aod.jpg[/img]


The "Fix":

[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/800x600q90/661/pJS9At.jpg[/img]

[center][url=https://www.instagram.com/moddingheaven/][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/150x100q90/923/sYzebp.png[/img][/url]    [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC35zF0WXRHSvL0F7DUoHMEw][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/150x100q90/923/G8PRqH.png[/img][/url][/center]
[center][url=https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100011257417644][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/150x100q90/923/2j6nDq.png[/img][/url]      [url=https://twitter.com/tonycubed2/][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/150x100q90/922/3DL3o9.png[/img][/url][/center]
author: SOT Team
